revised_title: A Study of Nitrification in Sewage Purification Processes
tldr: This study investigates the process of nitrification in sewage purification, focusing on the role of bacteria in the oxidation and mineralization of putrescible substances. The research compares two filtration methods, 'contact' and 'continuous,' and examines the organisms involved in nitrification, comparing them to those found in soil by Winogradsky.
